name: BLOCK-T160
configuration_schema:
$schema: http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#
title: BLOCK-T160 Configuration
description: Configuration for the BLOCK-T160 Chromaticity Test WET-008.
type: object
properties:
  ra:
    description: Right Ascension.
    type: number
    default: 0
  dec:
    description: Declination.
    type: number
    default: 0
  exposure_time:
    description: Exposure Time.
    type: number
    default: 30.0
